item.title: How to Include .eps Images with pdflatex
item.description: PdfLaTeX does not support eps files by default. Add the following imports in the beginning: \usepackage{graphicx} % already added \usepackage{epstopdf} After that the includegraphics commands with eps arguments should produce no problems. Reference: [+]
